data.description: Join The Team Make Exiger Your Next Big Opportunity Exiger is revolutionizing the way corporations, government agencies, and banks manage risk and compliance in their third-parties, supply chains, and customers through its software and tech-enabled solutions. Exiger’s mission is to make the world a safe and transparent place to succeed. View all job openings We’re looking for world-class talent to join our global team. Our success is rooted in our people and built on a commitment to excellence through diversity of thought, inclusive and innovative problem solving, and a focus on keeping our clients at the center of everything we do. --e-global-typography-6b62bee-font-size );line-height:var( --e-global-typography-6b62bee-line-height );}} Exiger Named in Fast Company’s 2024 List of Brands That Matter The annual award recognizes brands that achieve cultural significance and deep customer connections. Exiger was included in the United States Brands category. This is the second consecutive year that Exiger has been recognized. Read More See What Exiger Has to Offer We believe in providing exceptional benefits that support our employees personally and professionally. In addition to competitive compensation and on-the-job growth opportunities, we provide generous benefits and perks. what we believe in Exiger Values 01 Mission Inspired We serve a purpose greater than ourselves. We are true partners to our customers, empowering them to drive meaningful change. Inspired by our increasing global impact, we drive the standard for our industry and make the world a safer and more transparent place to succeed. 02 Imagination Driven We are relentless innovators. Guided by the critical challenges our customers face, we build our product roadmap to be their trailblazers. We create a powerful nexus between next generation AI technology and deep domain expertise to drive lasting impact and help shape the world for a safer tomorrow. 03 Trust Anchored We illuminate facts and inspire trust. Our technology provides a defensible source of real-time insights for our customers, empowering them to lead with confidence and integrity. Our AI platform makes the world more transparent, promoting a free, open, and secure global market. 04 Compassion Focused We lead with empathy and aspire to be kind. We center ourselves and our actions on the betterment of the world by enabling the rapid recovery from unplanned disruptions for our customers. Our technology promotes a more resilient, just and ethical world by exposing those who seek to subjugate, steal or do harm. “I am excited by how Exiger can expose risk, help manage supply chains, detect threats, and increase transparency in the coming years through our innovative and AI-based technologies.” Jillian James Director, Product Management jQuery(document).ready(function($) { var arrow = $('.inner-page-rotate-arrow-secon'); var offset = arrow.offset(); function mouse(evt){ var center_x = (offset.left) + (arrow.width()/2); var center_y = (offset.top) + (arrow.height()/2); var x = evt.pageX; var y = evt.pageY; var radian = Math.atan2(x - center_x, y - center_y); var rot = (radian * (180 / Math.PI) * -1) + 180; arrow.css('-moz-transform', 'rotate('+rot+'deg)'); arrow.css('-webkit-transform', 'rotate('+rot+'deg)'); arrow.css('-o-transform', 'rotate('+rot+'deg)'); arrow.css('-ms-transform', 'rotate('+rot+'deg)'); } if ( arrow.length > 0 ) { $(document).mousemove(mouse); } }); .inner-page-rotate-arrow-secon:before { content: ""; width: 12px; height: 12px; background-color: #8B6EFF; position: absolute; left: 34px; border-radius: 30px; top: -3.8rem; z-index: 99999; } Available Jobs Current Job Openings Join our team and give your passion purpose. #view_all{display:none;} // Hide intro sections on the page for focus on job description function hideSections(ids) { ids.forEach(id => { const element = document.getElementById(id); if (element) { element.style.display = "none"; } }); } // Scroll down to job when a job ID is present in the query string if (window.location.search) { const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); const anchorId = urlParams.get("gh_jid"); if (anchorId) { const anchorElement = document.getElementById('job-openings'); if (anchorElement) { // hide sections const sectionIdsToHide = ["talent", "stats", "fast","offer","values","quote","join","current_header"]; hideSections(sectionIdsToHide); // and scroll to job description anchorElement.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" }); } } }
